name: 黃昏賢者 The Sage of Twilight
description: Tells the story of a certain blond LORI ordinary everyday life in another world, bedtime stories about the self and the world, truth and lies.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista/Windows 7/Windows 8 Processor: 1.7+ GHz or better Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Radeon HD5450 or better; 256 MB or higher DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 800 MB available space Sound Card: 100% DirectX9.0c compatible sound card and drivers
recommended_requirements: OS: Microsoft 64bit Windows 10 Processor: 1.7+ GHz or better Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Radeon HD5450 or better; 256 MB or higher DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 1024 MB available space Sound Card: 100% DirectX9.0c compatible sound card and drivers
